title: Can we get a auto rune feature
body: I cant count the amount of times i accidentally took thresh's runes for other champions because there is no auto rune feature i don't want it to be mandatory to have a auto rune feature but i'd like the option to change my runes in the beginning of champ automatically select right after i lock in a champ

replies.body:
You mean rune pages? 
or the 5 free pre-set runes it defaults to if you dont have a saved rune page selected?

> [{quoted}](name=Kazekiba,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=3GzkgA18,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-11-02T22:06:01.805+0000)
>
> You mean rune pages? 
> or the 5 free pre-set runes it defaults to if you dont have a saved rune page selected?

I think the request is to be able to link certain rune pages to certain champs, and automatically select the correct rune page when such a champ is chosen. Sounds like a reasonable idea to me.
